errors.reason_max_length: The reason must not exceed 120 characters
errors.observation_max_length: The observation must not exceed 2000 characters
errors.phone_invalid: The phone number entered is invalid
errors.email_invalid: The e-mail address entered is invalid
errors.email_exist: The e-mail address entered already exist
errors.email_required: The e-mail address field can not be blank
errors.store_name_invalid: The store name entered is invalid
errors.store_name_exist: The store name entered already exist
errors.spec_name_max_length: El nombre no debe superar los 200 caracteres.
errors.error_date: The maximum date range is 15 days
errors.errors_upload_product_again: Please fix the file's errors and upload the products again.
errors.errors_upload_offer_again: Please fix the errors in the file and upload the offer information again.
errors.error_price: Invalid price, the value must be higher or equal to 8.000.
errors.error_price_dscto: Invalid price, the value must be higher than the Discount Price entered.
errors.error_price_discount: Invalid discount price, the value must be higher or equal to 8.000.
errors.error_price_discount-2: PInvalid discount price, the value must be lower than the Price entered.
errors.error_promise: The delivery promise entered is invalid.
errors.quoting_postal_code_invalid: Invalid field (8 characters maximum, separated by a comma)
errors.blank_email: The e-mail address can not be blank
errors.error_check_payment: An error has occurred when browing payments.
errors.error_check_orders: An error has occurred when browing orders.
errors.error_user_login: The username must be a valid e-mail addres and is required.
errors.error_psw_login: The password cannot be blank or be too short (7 characters minimum).
errors.error_limit_format: The record limit cannot be blank
errors.error_guide_upload: Please fix the file's errors and upload the tracking numbers again.

dialog_token_expired.title: The session has expired
dialog_token_expired.body: The session has expired due to prolonged inactivity. Please try to enter once again.
dialog_token_expired.error_network: Network error, it seems you are not connected to the internet, please check your connection.
dialog_token_expired.error_service: An error has occurred when trying to access the server.
dialog_token_expired.error_acces: An error has occurred when trying to access the server.

billing.no_payment: No payment information has been found
billing.refresh_payment: Refresh all payment information with the button: INVOICING
billing.send_payment_information: We will send the payment information to the following e-mail address
billing.correctly_download: The payment information has been downloaded correctly, check your inbox
billing.error_download: An error has occurred when downloading the payment information

dashboard.info_cancel_sale: This info is approximated and doesn't take into account cancelations, additionaly the sales value y shown without taking freight values into account

download_format.ts_want_download: Do you want to download an empty format?

finish_upload_info.title: Correct records

billing_orders.txt_no_order: Enter the order number in the search bar to find a specific invoice
billing_orders.txt_no_invoices: There are no invoices associated with this order number
billing_orders.must_enter_order: You must enter an order number to see the invoices associated

download_order_modal.title: We will send you the
download_order_modal.sn_download_order: The orders have been downloaded correctly, check your inbox.
download_order_modal.sn_error_download: An error has occurred when downloading the orders.

order_page.wrong_to_search_orders: An error has occurred when loading the order list
order_page.info_no_more_products: The order has no more products pending to be sent
order_page.info_total_products: Total of products to be sent in the order

order_page.successfully_remove_mark: The order has been unflagged correctly

action_confirm_receipt.body_dialog: You have confirmed the reception of the product, we will proceed with the refund to the client.

action_report_novelty.title: Enter observation
action_report_novelty.rejected_request: Your request has been rejected, our team will evaluate your answer.
action_report_novelty.error_rejected: An error has occurred when trying to reject the request.

in_devolution_page.sn_error_request: An error has occurred while accepting the request.

action_accept_devolution.title: Approve refund request
action_accept_devolution.body: The request has been approved, we will notify the client so they can send you the product back.

list.cancel_message_modal: ¿Are you sure you want to cancel your holiday period? If you confirm this action you will return to an Active status, if the holiday period has already started, you must update all your offers again
list.enabled_message_modal: Are you sure you want to activate this account?
list.disabled_message_modal: To inactivate this account you must first input a reason and an observation that will explain to the Seller the reason for which their store is being inactivated. Once entered you may clic the ACCEPT button.
list.vacation_message_modal: To program a vacation period for this account, you must first insert an inicial date, a final date and clic the PROGRAM button. The effects will only be in place once the period has started. Remember that you must make a full offer update once the period has finished, otherwise your offers will not be able to be seen in the site.

register_seller.txt_description_seller: In this form you will be able to register sellers for Grupo Éxito's Marketplace. The sellers will have access to the Seller Center from the moment in which the credentials confirmation e-mail is received. We recommend following the the user manual's instructions when registering a new Seller.
register_seller.txt_description_admin: In this form you will be able to register sellers for Grupo Éxito's Marketplace. The sellers will have access to the Seller Center from the moment in which the credentials confirmation e-mail is received. We recommend following the the user manual's instructions when registering a new Seller

manage.txt_serch_seller: Enter the seller name in the search bar in order to see the data

contracts.txt_no_contract_seller: There are no current contracts associated to this seller

stores.txt_no_seller: Enter the store name in the search bar to see the categories.

create.modal_text_new_shipping: Enter a shipping company name and an associated shipping method, so it will appear in the seller's list when they configure the selected shipping method.
create.modal_text_new_zone: Enter a zone name and associated postal codes sepparated by a comma, so it will appear in the seller's list when they configure the selected shipping method.
create.modal_text_update_shipping: Replace the name of the existing shipping company and clic Save in order to modify the name of this registry.
create.modal_text_update_zone: Replace the name of the existing zone or the associated postal codes and clic Save in order to modify this zone.

download_historical.title: We will send the offer historic registry to the following e-mail address.
download_historical.snackbar_succes: The historic registry download has been made correctly, check your inbox.
download_historical.snackbar_error: An error has occurred when trying to download the historic registry.

historical_admin.without_offert: There is no offer registry available.

list.without_offert: There is no offer list registry.

detail_offer.snackbar_offer_product: This product is not ready for an offer to be associated, please try again later.
detail_offer.snackbar_currency: The corrency has been changed to

bulk_upload.text_step_import_to_offer: in this file you may enter your offer information
bulk_upload.exceeds_limits: The amount of assets found is over 1,048,576, this amount is not allowed.
bulk_upload.no_number: The product's price is not a number
bulk_upload.list_error_2: has not been indexed yet, please try again later.

finish_upload_information.error_upload_2: error(s) when uploading the offer information.

table_error.error_promise_delivery: must have the following format (# a #), the numbers must be greater than 0.
table_error.error_currency: must be either COP or USD.
table_error.diferent_ean: must be different than your own EAN.
table_error.incomplete_info: has missing information for a component
table_error.sum_price: should have a price comprised of the sum of the components.
table_error.sum_price_component: should have a discount price comprised of the sum of the components.

bulk_upload.text_step_import: In order to upload files to the Seller Center, you must first
bulk_upload.text_step_import_two: in this file you may enter your product information
bulk_upload.text_select_import_type: you wish to import (.xlsx, .xls) to the Seller Center and you are done.
bulk_upload.text_import_product: In order to import products to the Seller Center you may use the product creation formats that were sent to you previously, if you don't have the formats, you have to request them to your account manager. Remember to fill in the format completely according to the category of the products you are creating, and checking the restrictions of each field. In the case that your products don't count with an EAN code, you must fill in this field with a cero (0)
bulk_upload.select_product_category: Select a product category in order to download the upload file with the appropiate fields
bulk_upload.limit_for_day: You have reach the upload limit for today
bulk_upload.no_information_contains: The selected file contains no information
bulk_upload.contains_more_assets: The selected file contains more assets than allowed for today
bulk_upload.amount_records: The amount of records is over
bulk_upload.error_has_uploading: An error has occurred when uploading the information

table_errors_product.number_positive: must be a numeric positive value greater than 0, without decimals.

table_load_product.records_found: Records found, the following have errors

bulk_load_product_moderation.text_may_upload_product: In order to import files to the Seller Center, first you must
bulk_load_product_moderation.text_file_may_update: in this file you may upload the product validation
bulk_load_product_moderation.will_send_validation: We will send you the validation form to the following e-mail address
bulk_load_product_moderation.validation_sent_succesfully: The validation has been sent succesfully
bulk_load_product_moderation.validation_sent_couldnt_be_sent: Something happened, the validation couldn't be sent

assing_images.text_assign_images: In this section you must enter the correspondinge image URL for the producto you are creating. You may enter up to 5 product views, but the only mandatory is the first one. Remember that if your product doesn't have variations the image must be 1000x1000 pixels in size and it's format must be .jpg.  If your product has variations the image must be 733x1000 pixels in size and it's format must also be .jpg. If your product has variations you must also insert at least 1 image per variation.

basic_information.text_assign_images: In this section you must enter the correspondinge image URL for the producto you are creating. You may enter up to 5 product views, but the only mandatory is the first one. Remember that if your product doesn't have variations the image must be 1000x1000 pixels in size and it's format must be .jpg.  If your product has variations the image must be 733x1000 pixels in size and it's format must also be .jpg. If your product has variations you must also insert at least 1 image per variation.
basic_information.basic_product_information: In this section you must fill the basic product information. Remember that all the fields must be filled correctyly in order to continue. If your product has variations you must add each variation as a 'Child completely filling all the information for each one in the botton part of this section
basic_information.ean_invalida_multioffer: The EAN already exists, please associate a multioffer
basic_information.dont_have_ean: I don't have an EAN code for this product
basic_information.specific_name_invalid: The specific name for the color entered is invalid, It mustn't have spaces
basic_information.only_up_to_20_keywords: Only up to 20 keywords are valid.
basic_information.order_to_add_necessary: In order to add more variations it is necessary for the last variation to have correct data

categorization.now_you_must: Now you must categorize your product. In order to do this select the most apropiate category from the tree bellow. You may only select one specific subcategory for the product, if you need to look up the subcategory you need use the search bar entering the name and selection from the list.

dialog_save.product_creation_request: The product creation request has been succesful. The product will now go through our validation process and we will inform you as soon as possible whether the product has been accepted and an offer may be associated, or if it has been rejected and you must fix the information

specifications.text_must_specifications: In this section you must fill all the relevant specifications for the type of product you are creating. In each list you will see the specifications we consider important for your specific product type, if your product type is not in the lists you may add specifications in the bottom of this section
specifications.error_has_occured_uploading: An error has occurred when uploading the information
specifications.error_field: There is an error in the field

dialog.try_create_products: when trying to create the product. Try gain… Thank you

validate-ean.first_you_must_valid_ean: First you must enter a valid EAN or Bar Code for your product. Remember that this code must be real, since it identifies your product worldwide. For the EAN you may only enter numbers ranging from 7 to 13 characters. If you EAN contains less than 13 characters take into acount that it will be autocompleted with 0 to it's left until it has 13 characters. If you are a manufacturer or your product is generic you may pick the 'I don't have an EAN for my product' option and we will assign a code.
validate-ean.invalid_ean_format_multioffer: The EAN already exists, please associate a multioffer
validate-ean.not_have_ean_code: I don't have an EAN code for this product

list_products.ending_date: The ending date must NOT be inferior to the inicial date
list_products.date_must_no_be_initial_date: The starting date must NOT be later than the final date
list_products.you_must_initial: You must enter an inicial and ending date to filter

expanded_product.product_not_ready_offer: This product is not ready to have an offer associated to it, please try again later.
expanded_product.price_must_equal_combos: The price must be equal to the sum of the combos if there is no discounted price.

ofert_product.price_higher_product: The price must be higher or equal to 8000
ofert_product.discount_price_higher: The discount price must be higher or equal to 8000
ofert_product.promise_invalid: The delivery promise entered is invalid
ofert_product.promise_mandatoy: The delivery promise field is mandatory
ofert_product.shipping_cost_mandatory: The shipping cost field is mandatory
ofert_product.price_lower_discount: The price must not be lower or equal to the discount price
ofert_product.discount_price_sumatory_combo: The discount price must equal the sumatory of the combos
ofert_product.price_must_less: The price should not be less than 8000.
ofert_product.offer_has_been_correctly: The offer has been correctly applied
ofert_product.error_trying_apply_offer: Error when trying to apply and offer

brands.txt_add_brand: In order to create a brand you must enter the brand's name the way you want it to be shown in the sites. Keep into account that if the brand already exists you may not create it, and that you may not use any symbol or special character.
brands.txt_edit_brand: In brand modification you may only change the name. Keep into account that if the brand name already exists you may not change the name so it's the same, and that you may not use any symbol or special character.
brands.txt_no_permissions_view: you no have permissions to see the list

dialog.modal_text: Enter a name for the specification group and fill all the category codes for which the group must be shown to. In order to enter categories you may enter them one by one by writing the code, or enter all of them separated by commas. Remember that the categories must be valid in order to continue.
dialog.modal_placeholder_add_category: In order to add, it is necessary to clic the (+).

dialogAddSpecs.modal_text_1: Enter a name for the specification and select whether its mandatory or not in order to create the product. You must determine whether this specification will be an input or list type.
dialogAddSpecs.modal_text_2: In the case you select a list type, you must also enter minimum 2 options
dialogAddSpecs.modal_text_3: for the seller to pick, you may add more if necessary.

categories.title: Configuration
categories.subtitle: Category tree
categories.modal_update_description: To modify a category level you must change the information filled in any of the available fields. You cannot modify information that is blocked, and all the fields must be filled in order to save the modification.
categories.modal_create_description: To create a category level you must first insert a name and it's respective pairing code with every available channel. Make sure to full and check all the information, since the category levels cannot be deleted later.

load_guide.title: LOADING GUIDES
load_guide.body: In order to upload files to Seller Center, first you must
load_guide.body_3: , in this file you may enter tracking numbers and shipping company names
load_guide.warning_register: Remember that the maximum number of allowed records is 500.
load_guide.amount_not_allowed: The number of records exceeds 500, this amount is not allowed.
load_guide.error_has_uploading_guide: There was an error submitting the guide.

support_modal.ts_send_msj: Your message has been sent to the support team.
support_modal.ts_error_msj_support: An error occurred when trying to send the message to the support team.
support_modal.title: Enter your case
support_modal.description: Enter here the information in order to send a case to our support team
support_modal.tooltip_case: Enter the name of the person who is recording the case
support_modal.list_case: Select the case's motive from the list
support_modal.title_case: Enter a title for you case. This field has 120 characters as it's maximum
support_modal.desc_case: This field must contain 120 characters as it's maximum
support_modal.list_type_case: Select the case's type from the list.
support_modal.email_contact: Enter an e-mail address so we can contact you. If the e-mail address entered is incorrect please fix it. IMPORTANT: We will respond to this address.
support_modal.error_email: The entered e-mail address is invalid.
support_modal.description_case: Enter a detailed description of your case. This field has 2.000 characters as it's maximum
support_modal.limit_field: This field has 2.000 characters as it's maximum.
